"Hatsukari": "The call from Central was rather sudden. Sorry for the lack of a more official welcome!"
"I can't speak for everyone else, but I'm glad to have ya with us!"
"Yo! The name's Hatsukari. I'm the Commander of the 2nd Combat Platoon here in the Stia region."
"You might not be too used to this place, but you do good work. Honestly, this helps me out as well."
"Though I bet there's a lot about Stia you still don't know 'bout, yeah?"
"I can teach ya about all the nastier enemies 'round here, so go ahead and ask."
"\"Sonners\", they're called, are a real troublesome sort."
"Until you bust up all of the \"Dazzle Pods\" nearby, the main body is impervious to damage..."
"So if you run into one, make sure you take them out first!"
"Mmm... Got plans elsewhere, do ya? Alright, come talk to me some other time then."
